citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on
03-Oct-18.
The registrant's aunt was at the facility and told us that Ms. Hubbard was out of town and would be unavailable all
day.
Additional Inspectors
Vernon Kathryn, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
